title: How does Spotify pay the copyright owners for the song, do they use the per user model or do they pay them upfront? - Quora

response.answer_text: I`m not sure how it works today with all the platforms out there selling music, but ASCAP, keeps tabs on what is going out because i believe any platform of music must keep records of what they play and how many times they play them and then its sent to ASCAP, and they do an audit, to make sure the artist is paid
